entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
